name: MC Pedrinho
description: '''Pedro Maia Tempester''' (born May 3, 2002), better known by the stage name of '''MC Pedrinho''', is a [[Brazilians|Brazilian]] [[Funk carioca|funk]] artist. He is best known for his song titled "Dom Dom Dom". His songs have experienced an attempted ban by prosecutors within the national territory on account of the explicit lyrics in his songs.
